translation: Endowed with wisdom and evenness of mind, one casts off in this life both good and evil deeds; therefore, devote yourself to Yoga; Yoga is skill in action.
commentary: 2.50 endowed with wisdom? Jahati casts off? Ih in this life? Standing both? good and evil deeds in good and evil deeds? Therefore therefore? Yoga to Yoga? fight devote thyself? Yoga: Yoga? Karmasu in actions? skill.Commentary Only work performed with motive towards fruits can bind a man. It will bring the fruits and the performer of the action will have to take birth again in this mortal world
